plot outline: Vasu and Janvi are a married couple struggling to find love in their lives. They are on the verge of getting divorced when India goes into a state of lockdown in April 2020. The story gets hilarious after the arrival of two unexpected guests into their house.
title: Ikkat
plot: A couple on the verge of divorce have to stay together during lockdown as a nasty surprise awaits them.

Vasu and Janvi are a married couple struggling to find love in their lives. They are on the verge of getting divorced when India goes into a state of lockdown in April 2020. The story gets hilarious after the arrival of two unexpected guests into their house.
